Viewing Distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
Summary: Red Orb slowly crossed the sky.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in New Castle
There were no other sightings in New Castle on or around March 30th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my living room window where I had my last sighting of a different form of UFO back in July of 2011. When I first spotted it, I thought it could've been the planet mars - due to its bright red color. That's when I noticed it was moving very slow from left to right across the sky. And this is over the brightly lit city of New Castle. It was a starlike orb that twinkled and pulsed. It was the slowest thing I've ever seen, and I've seen many possible ufos. I lost sight of it after leaving to do something. When I'd returned the orb was nowhere to be seen. I had only left for no less than 5-10 minutes. Perhaps, it was the planet Mars, but I'm sure Mars doesn't move like this orb did.
